WRITING.TITLE: My 1k haul ended up costing 1400 all in
WRITING.TEXT:
Just thought I would give you all an insight into how much extra it costs to get them to your doorstep! This isn't including any customs charges that may incur on the way!! I have GP'd everything except the Balenciaga runners from Slamxhype as there are many reviews on them already.
Superbuy proof : http://m.imgur.com/a/7e8Pv
CSSbuy proof : http://m.imgur.com/gallery/EP4n8Tb
The total for the items only so far this month are 995.45.
I have shipped everything with EMS in 6 different packages with a total weight of 23.5kg and total cost of shipping was 285.91.
Because I didn't top up my account in one go with 1k I just paid for everything separately on my card I managed to rack up a total of 78.30 in bank charges for currency conversion! (Lucky for US buyers as everything is in USD)
That's a total just short of 1400 ($1800) so basically when ordering from Taobao you should add 40% on top of the price of an item to get a good estimate of what it will cost to get to your door!
I hope this helps you out on your future purchases when your on a budget!

WRITING.TITLE: [Question] Anybody else get annoyed with people asking for QC's on tao links?
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm so tired of trying to help you guys out but when I click on your QC and it takes me to taobao, odds are that those photo's aren't even their own. If somebody GL's a tao link and you buy it, then it comes to the warehouse completely different, your gonna be pissed. And please get HQ pics from your agent, it's free if you use superbuy!
End of rant.
